title: Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha1 released - First iteration of our Jakarta EE 10 stream
content: Last week, Max Andersen explained our plans for Quarkus 3 and Jakarta EE 10. I published yesterday a more detailed blog post explaining how we are building the Quarkus 3 stream. It is now time to announce Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha1 which is the first iteration of our Quarkus 3 stream. A...
